definition.en:
Indicates that the CreativeWork contains a reference to, but is not necessarily about a concept.
Auch item about a person or an object mentioned in the inscription's text. Use on Wikimedia Commons on media files.
definition.de:
Indicates that the CreativeWork contains a reference to, but is not necessarily about a concept.
Also Personen oder Objekte, die in der Inschrift erwähnt werden. Für die zukünftige Verwendung für Wikimedia Commons.
definition.fr:
Indicates that the CreativeWork contains a reference to, but is not necessarily about a concept.
Ou personne ou objet mentionné dans le texte de l'inscription.
definition.es:
Indicates that the CreativeWork contains a reference to, but is not necessarily about a concept.
O persona u objeto mencionado en el texto de una inscripción.

title.en: ActivityPub and friends – An ontology of the fediverse
title.de: ActivityPub und Freunde - Eine Ontolgie des Fediverse
title.fr: ActivityPub et ses amis - Une ontologie du fediverse
title.es: ActivityPub y sus amigos - Una ontología del fediverso
